resources.string: A classic meal, composed of a juicy, lightly seasoned chicken fillet, grilled on the griddle. Served with loose white rice and cooked beans.
Slices of breaded and fried meat, covered with homemade tomato sauce and a generous layer of gratinated mozzarella cheese. Served with mashed potatoes.
Grilled salmon fillet, drizzled with a sweet and sour, refreshing passion fruit sauce. Served with broccoli rice and sautéed vegetables.
Vegetarian option with layers of grilled eggplant, cottage cheese, and tomato sauce, baked until gratinated.
A light and refreshing drink, prepared with sparkling water, ice, and a delicious fruit syrup of your choice.
Fresh, 100% natural juice, squeezed to order. No added sugar or preservatives.
Traditional creamy recipe, made with lime, water, ice, and condensed milk.
Chilled water with slices of Sicilian lemon, cucumber rounds, and mint leaves. Extremely refreshing and zero calories.
A generous portion of french fries, cut into sticks, golden and crispy on the outside, with a soft and delicious interior.
Onion rings breaded in special flour, fried to perfection, resulting in a crispy and flavorful crust. Served with barbecue sauce.
A portion of cooked and then fried cassava (yuca), seasoned with salt and rosemary. Ideal for accompanying any dish.
Small pastries filled with creamy mozzarella, fried to order. Portion of 10 units.
Served warm, they guarantee an unparalleled texture with every bite.
A classic and creamy pâté, prepared with high-quality tuna and seasoned with selected spices.
Fresh and soft, these small breads are the ideal base for enjoying the sides.
A mix of green and black olives marinated in olive oil, garlic, and fine herbs.
Traditional Brazilian cheese rolls, served warm and soft. Portion of 6 units.
Creamy and lightly salted butter, perfect to accompany toasts and small breads.
A light dessert, with a crunchy texture outside and soft inside, made mainly from egg whites beaten with sugar.
Brazils favorite dessert. Creamy, with small holes, and a dark, delicious caramel sauce.
Aerated and intense semi-sweet chocolate mousse. Finished with white chocolate shavings.
A selection of fresh, seasonal fruits (strawberry, mango, banana, papaya, kiwi) cut into cubes and served chilled.
